levels.description: Attacks turn into delayed detonation grenades that deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage, and decrease the ASPD of enemies hit by <@ba.vup>-{-attack@attack_speed}</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@duration}</> seconds
